pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw:
It looks like deleting the sky is segfaulting on Xenial but passing on Trusty (we can see that the test passes on [Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/824/)).

So this doesn't get blocked too long, I ticketed issue #2118 and skipped the sky deletion on 9f38ec1 for now.
